testcase.name: Use search to find blog articles
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to CIIT homepage...........................................passed Then I should see the company logo..........................................passed When I switch to the blog page..............................................passed And scroll to the search field..............................................passed And I click the search input field..........................................passed And the field gains focus...................................................passed When I type in java.........................................................passed And the live search list appears............................................passed And I confirm my search via pressing the enter key..........................passed Then I will be redirected to a new page.....................................passed And the results will be listed..............................................passed
